clinical_history: Limb swelling, rule out deep venous thrombosis.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates normal, no hydronephrosis.
Placenta is mildly thickened and normally located.
Soft tissue region demonstrates isoechoic without fluid collection.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Uterus appears hypoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 23.82 mm.
